alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 5:41PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Lincoln County through 630 PM CDT... At 540 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lincoln, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lincoln, Beverly, Barnard and Westfall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
